archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft SharePoint
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: SharePoint, developed by Microsoft, is an integrated platform used for collaboration, document management, and intranet creation. It allows organizations to build websites, store, organize, share, and access information from any device. With its rich feature set including workflows, team sites, and integration capabilities with Microsoft 365 tools, SharePoint facilitates seamless collaboration and information sharing, catering to both small businesses and large enterprises.
